name: Drawing Compare
blurb: Redesigned drawing comparison for AutoCAD Web: from 0.2% usage on desktop to highest driver of adoption on web.

name: Search
blurb: Multiple search features from 2022-2025, covering in-drawing text, tabbed dialogs (i.e. settings), and file manager (where I also handled front-end implementation).

name: Hackathon t-shirt
blurb: Is it possible to design hackathon swag teammates actually want to wear? Reversing a decade-plus of "no" on our team through informal research, getting into the details of garment design, and cats.

name: Year of the Snake poster
blurb: Digital illustration → 2-color print to ring in last lunar new year, trying to overcome the snake's culturally-ubiquitous bad reputation.

name: Capturing field data with LiDAR
blurb: New use case for AutoCAD mobile: integrating on-site mobile data capture into project drawings through photos, videos, and LiDAR / RoomPlan API.

name: Cloud drawing continuity
blurb: Building trust in the cloud with a traditional, skeptical user base with highly-transparent, provider-agnostic file access across devices.

name: Custom LISP plugin support
blurb: Designing-by-code to support 40 years of customer-made plugins on Web for the first time.

name: Notifications refactor
blurb: Systematizing a decade-plus of ever-accumulating, customer-irritating messaging with a logical, extensible framework for notification design.

name: Web apps design technology
blurb: Design systems (Storybook, Figma API), human processes (design-engineering handoff, design systems compliance), engineering mentorship on the web apps team at Proteus Digital Health.

name: Childrens' health scorecard
blurb: Solo 0→1 design and dev revolutionizing how Children Now advocates for kids' wellness with a dynamic, layered, and easy-to-explore data visualization for web and mobile, using SVG, React, styled-components, MobX, and Storybook.

name: LinkedIn Sales Navigator integration
blurb: Solo 0→1 design and dev for Sendbloom's integration of marquee new LinkedIn feature: started to shipped in 1 week, to coincide with LinkedIn's official product announcement.

name: Goals & Tasks tracking
blurb: Solo 0→1 design and dev of widget and panel designed for sales reps to track and rank their progress towards team-set goals on Sendbloom.

name: Optimizing email campaigns
blurb: Solo 0→1 design and dev enabling sales reps to add new recipients into an ongoing email campaign, by user request - using animation to preserve context and delight across multiple steps.

name: 0→1 UI Component Library
blurb: As designer #2 on a <10-employee startup, learned, then single-handedly built React Storybook to systematize our UI engineering - evangelizing component reuse, extending components to meet engineers' needs, building my own designs in Storybook, and writing API docs.

name: Astronomical app onboarding
blurb: Designed+animated onboarding animation for swiping in Origami Logic's mobile app.

name: Social Energy Sensing Monument
blurb: Interactive installation that combines robotics, IoT, and a mobile web app into a public monument for engaging and enthralling a community with its own issues and the underlying data.

name: Mars spaceflight mission design
blurb: Produced initial pitch animation, then final, one-shot (no "camera cuts") 15-minute presentation showcasing Eclipse Rocketry Club at Davis' proposal for a manned flyby of Mars. Took 4th place of 38 among international qualifiers for Inspiration Mars conference in Houston.

name: Assorted pitch videos
blurb: Animations promoting Stuffrage (startup incubating at Davis in 2012) and Wake (smart alarm clock which was successfully funded on Kickstarter), and myself (old portfolio reel from 2014 of pre-college and student design, 2007-2014).
